body:
I am going to be uploading a slice-of-life-sort-of story about Zone and three others. Their links will be in the description, check out their content and their pages. It'll help them out. Big shoutout to Batgirl12309, KrewLee47 and Nanohanan.

Beware, I may not continue this, as one of my mates are still sort of... "skeptical" to say, so if they don't like it, I'll either remove it or replace it with someone else. Already have one other person in mind.

Laterz!
XxMLRPJordanxX - (Can't wait until I leave school in 6 weeks)
